summary: A retexture of the elven equipment that will give a metalic look to the armor and weapons.
descriptionHtml:
Firstly, this is my first mod.
I made it because I wanted to learn how to retexture, and because I wanted a mod that would change the colors of the elven equipment into something metalic, but I couldn\'t find a complete one. It was meant to be something personal, but it looks pretty well, so I think that I should upload it. It replaces the textures of the elven equipment, it\'s not a stand-alone mod (at least not yet).
 
Mods I recommend with this one:
Morrowind looking Glass Retexture
Cloaks of Skyrim
Winter is Coming Cloaks
Fur Hoods HD
HD Ore and Ingots

Main Files (choose only one of the three files): 
1)Metalic Elven Equipment with Leather and Metalic Scales - this version includes the Metalic Elven Equipment with metalic scales on the sides of the armor, and leather scales in the middle of the armor, on the gauntlets and on the boots. The cloth around the abdomen is white. The weapons are the same for each version.
2)Metalic Elven Equipment with Leather Scales - this version includes the Metalic Elven Equipment with leather scales on the sides of the armor and the middle of the armor, on the gauntlets and on the boots. The cloth around the abdomen is white. The weapons are the same for each version.
3)Metalic Elven Equipment with Metalic Scales - this version includes the Metalic Elven Equipment with metalic scales on the sides of the armor and the middle of the armor, on the gauntlets and on the boots. The cloth around the abdomen is white. The weapons are the same for each version.

Optional files (as the name says, they are only optional, you don\'t need to download them if you like the original armor):
1)Brown Cloth for Metalic Elven Equipment with Leather and Metalic Scales - changes the white cloth into a brown one.
2)Brown Cloth for Metalic Elven Equipment with Leather Scales - changes the white cloth into a brown one.
3)Brown Cloth for Metalic Elven Equipment with Metalic Scales - changes the white cloth into a brown one.
4)Gray Cloth for Metalic Elven Equipment with Leather and Metalic Scales - changes the white cloth into a gray one.
5)Gray Cloth for Metalic Elven Equipment with Leather Scales - changes the white cloth into a gray one.
6)Gray Cloth for Metalic Elven Equipment with Metalic Scales - changes the white cloth into a gray one.
7)Shinier Metalic Elven Equipment - this file makes the metal shinier. It is compatible with all three main files, and you can use the recolored cloths too with this.
author: Edg94
